advisory.name: RLBA-2021:1699
advisory.synopsis: crontabs bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for crontabs is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation
Enterprise Linux 8.4 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: /usr/bin/run-parts has a fatal programming error which can cause cron to hang perpetually
